data_quality_notes: Twitter countTweets exact phrase matching is nearly useless for niche detection (0-4 results)
Twitter broad keyword search is extremely noisy (OR matching gives 100K+ false positives)
Reddit JP returns Chinese content due to kanji overlap — unreliable for JP
Instagram results heavily polluted with AI tools promotion spam
YouTube (yt-dlp) provides the cleanest, most reliable demand signal
Grok API qualitative search is best for knowledge gap and commercial signal detection
